sentences.en: "Hey, I don't know what you're talking about," Russo objected.
sentences.cn: “喂，我不知道你在说些什么，”拉索反驳道。

sentences.en: "Hey, Judith," he resumed, "tell me all about yourself."
sentences.cn: “嘿，朱迪思，”他接着说，“跟我谈谈你自己吧。”

sentences.en: Hey wow, man! Where d'you get those boots?
sentences.cn: 哎哟，老弟，哪里搞来的靴子？

sentences.en: Hey, can I just ask you something?
Hey, don't muss up my hair!
Hey, I know what, I'll get a bumper sticker printed up.
sentences.cn: 嘿，有了，我会找人印刷一些保险杠贴纸。

sentences.en: Hey, just a minute. Where do you think you're going with my handbag?
sentences.cn: 嗨, 等一下! 你拿着我的手提袋上哪儿去了?

sentences.en: Hey, look at the time! We'll talk about it tonight. All right?
sentences.cn: 嘿，看看都几点啦？咱们晚上再讨论，好不好？

sentences.en: Hey, Ma. It's the old man.
You just press the button and, hey presto, a perfect cup of coffee!
sentences.cn: 只要按下按钮，嘿，马上就出来一杯上好的咖啡！

words.tran_cn: 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)（用于打招呼或唤起注意）嘿

trans.tran_cn: （用以引起注意，表示惊异或询问）嘿，喂，你好！（表示问候），咳
trans.tran_en: a shout used to get someone’s attention or to show surprise, interest, or annoyance
a shout used to get someone’s attention or to show surprise, interest, or annoyance
